ctx: intros n R R' HPRrel HPRrel'.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

ctx: intros n R R' HPRrel HPRrel'.
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat R, R' : naryRel n HPRrel : isPRrel n R HPRrel' : isPRrel n R' Unable to unify "(fix naryRel (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => bool | S n0 => nat -> naryRel n0 end) ?M1412" with "{p : PrimRec n | extEqual n (evalPrimRec n p) (charFunction n (andRel n R R'))}".

ctx: intros n R R' HPRrel HPRrel'.
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat R, R' : naryRel n HPRrel : isPRrel n R HPRrel' : isPRrel n R' Unable to unify "{p : PrimRec ?M1412 | extEqual ?M1412 (evalPrimRec ?M1412 p) (charFunction ?M1412 (orRel ?M1412 ?M1413 ?M1414))}" with "{p : PrimRec n | extEqual n (evalPrimRec n p) (charFunction n (andRel n R R'))}".

original: intros n R R' HPRrel HPRrel'. unfold isPRrel. split. - apply andRel; auto. - apply orRelPR; auto.
